subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0017_01C9D91A.8198ED70
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

The problem with it Jim is that there is no way to "clean" the audio withou=
t effecting the stuff you want to keep as well. At least not with the cheap=
y softwares. I head the Adobe Audition is much better at it, but still not =
perfect.

But again, enhance all you want, just make sure you keep the orig=
inal unaltered.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: James W. Hyslope 
=
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 19, 2009 7:11 PM
  Subj=
ect: [EVP-ITC] Re: I have a question.





  Well, for myself...I don't "cl=
ean" them up to much because I really don't know HOW :) (well a little bit)=
Since I've only been at it for a couple weeks. BUT if you can clean up some=
thing to where you can FIND what was there to begin with "you have done no =
harm" I hear alot more than others I guess, and I haven't enhanced many of =
my evp's.*If anyone is able to clean them up...I DO promise you will hear w=
hat I say is correct)Pretty BOLD statement, but if you are able to clean it=
 up with better software (please do for others too) I will be more than hap=
py to "listen" where I made a mistake...I can only LEARN from it :) I have =
done some DEEP enhancements to a few of my evp's...from the begining I coul=
d only hear clicks and thumps.....but after messing with that area, eventua=
lly I would hear the true voices (and can tell if male or female...approxim=
ate age) and understand the mood also....these where extreamly modified, an=
d I feel that I could NOT have added enough "simple" enhancements that woul=
d ADD a voice....full of emotion and distinct syllables :) And some just ca=
n't hear them for what ever reason be it equipment that is used to hear (pc=
-headphones-speakers-ears) know one has the perfect match of all these thin=
gs. Check out "Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's" in the files section....work them over =
till you hear them. I really can't do much more :)--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s.com, Eric VanDuzer <evanduzer@...> wrote:
  >
  > Now I may be biased to =
the "investigation" way of doing things. I do clean
  > up evps if I hear s=
omething and can't make it out do to ambient noise. So
  > hear is my quest=
ion. When do you stop cleaning up? Wouldn't to much
  > enhancing "taint" t=
he results? To me the more enhancing you do the less
  > convincing it beco=
mes. I hope noone finds this offensive, it is not meant
  > to be I am just=
 really curious. The way I look at it is that if you have to
  > do so much=
 enhancing to find anything, was there really something there to
  > begin =
with. Are we just making ourselves believe there is something there??
  > 
=
  > Eric
  >



  
------=_NextPart_000_0017_01C9D91A.8198ED70
